Package net.chaossquad.mclib.packetentity

Class PacketEntityManager

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.packetentity.PacketEntityManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Listener
public class PacketEntityManager extends Object implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
The packet entity manager handles packet entities. It adds, removes and cleans up packet entities, allows to access the packet entities and updates the information of packet entities.
